def capitalize_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split('')
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in words]
    capitalized_sentence = ' '.join(capitalized_words)
    return capitalized_sentence

def capitalize_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    capitalized_words = [word.capitalize() for word in words]
    capitalized_sentence = ''.join(capitalized_words)
    return capitalized_sentence
